mapper.sql: b.idBands as band_id, b.name as band_name, b.membersAmount as band_memberAmount, b.genre as band_genre, m.idMusician as musician_id, m.role as musician_role, p.idPerson as musician_idPerson, p.name as musician_name, p.lastname as musician_lastname, p.age as musician_age
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bands AS b right join musician as m on b.idBands = m.Bands_idBands inner join person as p on m.Person_idPerson = p.idPerson where idBands = #{id}
